daily.text: Daily walk in nature brings tranquility to one’s life.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Heavenly Father, thank you for the blessing that you bestow upon me daily.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Life is full of change and uncertainty. We know this. We experience it on a daily basis.
daily.author: Carre Otis

daily.text: I'm on JetBlue and United. So I spend a lot of time on airplanes with other people and in terminals or just traveling around and going to restaurants or whatever. The interaction I get on a daily basis is always positive. I've never had a negative interaction.
daily.author: Lance Armstrong

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: The idea of prosthetics is a tool. Most people's cell phones are prosthetics. If you leave your cell phone at home, you feel impacted by not having it. It's an important part of your daily function and what you can do in a day.
daily.author: Aimee Mullins

daily.text: Time flies. It’s up to you to be the navigator.
daily.author: Robert Orben

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: The Sewing Machine CharmTo A Life Bound by Family, The Thread That Ties Us All Together.
daily.author: Viola Shipman

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: Every day holds infinite opportunities. Explore!
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: A good host is someone who really takes care of everyone, from the food to their daily programme. I can't.
daily.author: Christian Louboutin

daily.text: Love thy soul, manifest thy light.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: May you find new strength to accomplish your daily work.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: I am a virtuous woman.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Whenever I am in a difficult situation where there seems to be no way out, I think about all the times I have been in such situations and say to myself, 'I did it before, so I can do it again.
daily.author: Idowu Koyenikan

daily.text: You need to think about the month, you need to plan the day, you need to take your elephant and divide into pieces and eat a slice a day.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: You must know what you need to do every day to carry out your mission.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: We live in an age when the traditional great subjects - the human form, the landscape, even newer traditions such as abstract expressionism - are daily devalued by commercial art.
daily.author: Andy Warhol

daily.text: Right now I am trying to be in a place of calm, a place where I can chill out and then handle the chaos of life better. You don't just get it overnight; you have to work at it. It's a daily struggle.
daily.author: Jackee Harry

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: Depend upon yourself. Make your judgement trustworthy by trusting it. You can develop good judgement as you do the muscles of your body - by judicious, daily exercise. To be known as a man of sound judgement will be much in your favor.
daily.author: Grantland Rice

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: Travel is life-changing. That's the promise made by a thousand websites and magazines, by philosophers and writers down the ages. Mark Twain said it was fatal to prejudice, and Thomas Jefferson said it made you wise. Anais Nin observed that 'we travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.' It's all true. Self-transformation is what I sought and what I found.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: All my life I have lived and behaved very much like the sandpiper just running down the edges of different countries and continents, looking for something.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Bishop

wanderlust.text: The fear of rape puts many women in their place - indoors, intimidated, dependent yet again on material barriers and protectors... I was advised to stay indoors at night, to wear baggy clothes, to cover or cut my hair, to try to look like a man, to move someplace more expensive, to take taxis, to buy a car, to move in groups, to get a man to escort me—all modern versions of Greek walls and Assyrian veils, all asserting it was my responsibility to control my own and men's behavior rather than society's to ensure my freedom. I realized that many women had been so successfully socialized to know their place that they had chosen more conservative, gregarious lives without realizing why. The very desire to walk alone had been extinguished in them—but it had not in me.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: I am a world of uncertainties disguised as a girl.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: Show me that horizon, promise me a world better than this on the other side of the sun.
wanderlust.author: Saim .A. Cheeda

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: That thing the nature of which is totally unknown to you is usually what you need to find, and finding it is a matter of getting lost. The word ‘lost’ comes from the old Norse ‘los’ meaning the disbanding of an army…I worry now that people never disband their armies, never go beyond what they know.Advertising, alarmist news, technology, incessant busyness, and the design of public and private life conspire to make it so. A recent article about the return of wildlife to suburbia described snow-covered yards in which the footprints of animals are abundant and those of children are entirely absent. Children seldom roam, even in the safest places… I wonder what will come of placing this generation under house arrest.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: Paradise was always over there, a day’s sail away. But it’s a funny thing, escapism. You can go far and wide and you can keep moving on and on through places and years, but you never escape your own life. I, finally, knew where my life belonged. Home.
wanderlust.author: J. Maarten Troost

wanderlust.text: There was a lust of wandering in his feet that burned to set out for the ends of the earth. On! On! His heart seemed to cry. Evening would deepen above the sea, night fall upon the plains, dawn glimmer before the wanderer and show him strange fields and hills and faces. Where?
wanderlust.author: James Joyce

wanderlust.text: Without struggle, success has no value.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: A wave of saudade swept over me as I realized home never existed at all. The concept of home felt far from my reach, and I felt sick with longing.
wanderlust.author: M.B. Dallocchio

wanderlust.text: What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: At some point, you just gotta forgive the past, your happiness hinges on it.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: It is so gratifying to tell so many stories my eye can romance with, that I become the stories.They shall live on after me, and in that way it makes me immortal.
wanderlust.author: Deejay Kapil

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: Don't know. Don't care. I'm hopping on a bus and going until I can't go any farther. Until I find a place that feels like home.'He's quiet for a long time. 'How will you know what home feels like?'It hangs in the air between us, as frozen as our breaths. I don't have an answer.
wanderlust.author: Holly Black

wanderlust.text: Raising d'être(reason for being).
wanderlust.author: Jennifer Pierre

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: It's time to change my life and see the world.
wanderlust.author: Jennifer Coletta

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: She was completely wholeand yet never fully complete.
wanderlust.author: Maquita Donyel Irvin

wanderlust.text: I hope you know that you are not alone, and in those hours when you feel that you are, just know there are other people out there — singing the same melodies of wanderlust, climbing over mountains in the dark, and waking in the night to stare at the moon, thinking of this large world and dreaming — just like you.
wanderlust.author: Apex

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: There is always an adventure waiting in the woods.
wanderlust.author: Katelyn S. Bolds

wanderlust.text: Summer is leaving silently. Much like a traveler approaching the end of an amazing journey.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: Don't lose heart, we're just rusty angels.
motivational.author: Stefan Emunds

motivational.text: No wrong in aiming or applauding the win but always agnize one's efforts.
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: There is a root to every action, which is really a reaction to what is going on inside of us.
motivational.author: Tanya R. Liverman

motivational.text: I was not born with a silver spoon in my mouth, nor did I have access to information like you do today via the internet. I had to learn everything the hard way. And I had to become a scientist the old-fashioned way, which is, not through academia, but through trial and error. And my hardship opened up unforeseen gateways of perception in my mind. And through these gateways, today the whole world is able to see its inner self.
motivational.author: Abhijit Naskar

motivational.text: As long as one refuses to know one's place, there's no telling what one can do in the world.
motivational.author: Candace Bushnell

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: The holy country is occupied by holy citizens.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The reason we have such a difficult time losing weight permanently is not because we are making bad choices, but because we are not stopping our automatic subconscious programmed behaviors in their tracks.
motivational.author: Elaine Moran

motivational.text: The only person you should ever fear losing in a relationship is you yourself.
motivational.author: Miya Yamanouchi

motivational.text: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: Triumphant moments are for wise thinkers...
motivational.author: Raajesh Pillai

motivational.text: You can, you will. You did.
motivational.author: M.L. Shanahan

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: If each of us were to confess his most secret desire  the one that inspires all his plans  all his actions  he would say: 'I want to be praised.'.
motivational.author: E. M. Cioran

motivational.text: Set the standard! Stop expecting others to show you love, acceptance, commitment, & respect when you don't even show that to yourself.
motivational.author: Steve Maraboli

motivational.text: Not getting a straight answer is a straight answer.
motivational.author: Sarvesh Jain

motivational.text: Christians sometimes make themselves into elephants afraid of mice. You have the Creator of the universe on your side; not to mention, you've been given eternal life. 'Whom or what shall you fear?' To be afraid of anything other than God himself is like an insult to God.
motivational.author: Criss Jami

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: ... But if I spend [all] my time *reading* about adventures, I won't actually be *having* them.
motivational.author: Lisa Kleypas

motivational.text: If the race isn't over after you have won, then it wasn't your game!
motivational.author: Vishwanath S J

motivational.text: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: I shall not be afraid of a calamity. God is my defender.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Practice honest self believe to learn and to better yourself.
motivational.author: Jerry Gladstone

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

love.text: That, after all, is what the great stories are written about: How people manage to find themselves in love. Well let me just say that how a person falls in love is more important than who they fall in love with, for to truly fall in love with someone else, you must first fall in love with yourself. The process a person goes through to break down his or her outer shell and let love in is often as miraculous as the mystery of falling in love.
love.author: Sage Steadman

love.text: To begin to know ourselves we must have sincere conversations with ourselves as if with a good friend. We must answer without reserve, listen without judgement, and accept without condition. That is self-love.
love.author: Kamand Kojouri

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: Love lost is better than hate found. True criticism is better than false praise. Genuine enemies are better than counterfeit friends.
love.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

love.text: I'll tell you a secret: Close your eyes and open your heart.
love.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

love.text: Give your all to every experience, feel it breathe it appreciate it, nothing lasts forever, when it's gone you'll remember the feeling it once gave you and sometimes that's enough.
love.author: Nikki Rowe

love.text: One loves truly only once in a lifetime, Julian, even if one isn’t aware of it.
love.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: Passion is the driving element of purpose. When one is possessed with it, labor is not perceived as toil - it is revealed as love.
love.author: T.F. Hodge

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: I'll follow you to the next life if I have to,' he whispered harshly in her ear. 'You'll never be free of me. I'll chase you through heaven and hell and beyond.' He continued to whisper without stopping while his hands gripped her body close to his. 'You stay with me, Holly,' he muttered savagely. 'Don't do this to me. You stay, damn you.
love.author: Lisa Kleypas

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: Friendship is selfless love, care, respect, and honor not a profitable opportunity.
love.author: Santosh Kalwar

love.text: There is no greater crime against humanity than usury.
love.author: Compton Gage

love.text: Peeta, how come I never know when you're having a nightmare?” I say.“I don't know. I don't think I cry out or thrash around or anything. I just come to, paralyzed with terror,” he says.“You should wake me,” I say, thinking about how I can interrupt his sleep two or three times on a bad night. About how long it can take to calm me down.“It's not necessary. My nightmares are usually about losing you,” he says. “I'm okay once I realize you're here.
love.author: Suzanne Collins

love.text: In a world like that, there'd be no need for love anymore either. If everyone were perfect, there would be no need to look out for others. Sympathy or Love is needed because people are imperfect. A perfect human cannot love anyone.
love.author: Tamiki Wakaki

love.text: As long as we don't cut off our hearts, the inner workings of the universe illuminate before us.
love.author: Rivera Sun

love.text: Come, my darling,it is never too late to begin our love again.
love.author: Atticus Poetry

love.text: What a strange world.  We trade our days for things.
love.author: Atticus Poetry

love.text: Fine,” he said. “You’re right. We’re not normal. We’re the most fucked-up, star-crossed lovers in history. So let’s not play nice.
love.author: Larissa Ione

happiness.text: When my mother didn't come back I realized that any moment could be the last. Nothing in life should simply be a passage from one place to another. Each walk should be taken as if it is the only thing you have left. You can demand something like this of yourself as an unattainable ideal. After that, you have to remind yourself about it every time you're sloppy about something. For me that means 250 times a day.
happiness.author: Peter Høeg

happiness.text: If your consciousness is without form, without quality, and without characteristics of any kind, would that not imply that the consciousness in every other being is also formless? And if they are all without form, how can you distinguish their consciousness from your own? What forms would you use to compare them? Isn’t the observing you exactly the same as the observing them?
happiness.author: Joseph P. Kauffman

happiness.text: No one is to blame because there is no one other than you. Nothing is to disrespect because there is nothing other than you.
happiness.author: Amit Ray

happiness.text: An ounce of joy is the equivalent of a ton of happiness.
happiness.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

happiness.text: I am a practical girl, and a life is only so long. It should be spent in as much peace and good eating and good reading as possible and no undue excitement. That is all I am after.
happiness.author: Catherynne M. Valente

happiness.text: The big reason why folks leave a small town,' Rant used to say, 'is so they can moon over the idea of going back. And the reason they stay put is so they can moon about getting out.'Rant meant that no one is happy, anywhere.
happiness.author: Chuck Palahniuk

happiness.text: Happiness is not always a reality many times it is in our memory.
happiness.author: Hockson Floin

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: …for I look upon the Frasers to be about as unhappy as most other married people.
happiness.author: Jane Austen

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: Seeking external validation brings disappointment. Validate yourself from within to find true happiness.
happiness.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

happiness.text: The successful cannot be unhappy -- it was a contradiction in terms.
happiness.author: Barry Unsworth

happiness.text: Sometimes I get so sad that it jest sounds good.
happiness.author: Abbi Glines

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: Happiness is not found in a life lived for the expectations of others.Rather than seek happiness living my life to please the will of others, I will seek happiness where I know it can be found—living my life to please the will of my heart.
happiness.author: Scott Stabile

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: The best thing you can do for yourself if you wish to see your dreams become reality is to find success and replicate it.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: Very few changes in life areachieved without effort and acommitment to making that effort.
happiness.author: Domonique Bertolucci

happiness.text: A loving heart is always young.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The actual secret to success: Be a better friend today than you were yesterday.
happiness.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

happiness.text: Love or not to loveWhen question ariseLove or not to loveAlways love.When question arise Be or not to beAlways be. When question ariseBelieve or not to believeAlways believe. When question ariseHelp or not to helpAlways help. When question ariseHope or not to hopeAlways hope. When question arise Dream or not to dream Always dream. Always keep hope aliveAlways dream with trust.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Five minutes after something happened might not be the best time for you to get into your Facebook and tell everybody. Men's panic does not produce God's power.
happiness.author: Patience Johnson

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Sorcha took the elevator down to the basement of the fashion house. She glanced at her stunningly beautiful reflection in the mirror and smiled to herself. How fortunate she was to be a vampire - no gray hairs, no wrinkles, no broken nails, no weight problems, and no PMT. What bliss! And how fortunate it was that all the legends about vampires were not true. She could not imagine an existence where she could not see and admire her own likeness - such a life to her would be intolerable and tedious. How could any female, even a vampire, survive without being able to see their own reflection? How could they do their hair and makeup? The very idea was totally preposterous.
happiness.author: Alan Kinross

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

positive.text: When one door of happiness closes  another opens  but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
positive.author: Helen Keller

positive.text: You can make a difference, wherever you are. It begins with a decision and defined purpose.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Life is great with positive outlook on life.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Whenever you encounter any fearful situation, there exists a great possibility for you to triumph only if you be willing enough to conquer the fear.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: To the voices in our heads that tell us we aren't good enough: do be quiet.
positive.author: Carrie Hope Fletcher

positive.text: You may encounter many disappointments. Be strong. Tell yourself, “I am good enough, I will try again.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: The pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity  the optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
positive.author: L. P. Jacks

positive.text: Trust men and they will be true to you  treat them greatly and they will show themselves great.
positive.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

positive.text: The confidence which we have in ourselves gives birth to much of that which we have in others.
positive.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
positive.author: Jane D. Hull

positive.text: My heart had been a darkened room for so very long, but then you found the light switch.
positive.author: John Mark Green

positive.text: They were so strong in their beliefs that there came a time when it hardly mattered what exactly those beliefs were  they all fused into a single stubbornness.
positive.author: Louise Erdrich

positive.text: We can transform our lives by renewal of our mind.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Dare to love greatly.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: Most females are dissatisfied with how they look and battle with countless insecurities, not realizing that you look most beautiful when you think you don’t. I wish that women and girls all over the world knew just how uniquely beautiful that we ALL are. Loving yourself for who YOU are is empowering! There’s great freedom in being unbothered by other people’s opinion of you.
positive.author: Stephanie Lahart

positive.text: If in the last few years you haven't discarded a major opinion or acquired a new one  check your pulse. You may be dead.
positive.author: Gelett Burgess

positive.text: The mind is its own place  and in itself can make a heaven of hell  a hell of heaven.
positive.author: John Milton

positive.text: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: All our final resolutions are made in a state of mind which is not going to last.
positive.author: Marcel Proust

positive.text: I think the media can be a very positive influence by essentially holding people to task about the importance of high quality medical care. And when the media is scrutinizing you, then I think that's a very good, positive thing for the field of medicine.
positive.author: Anthony Fauci

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: You ought to write down the glow of thoughts as it’s ignites.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Please hear me, you are not alone on this planet hurtling through space, solitude is an illusion, come let me help you, rise up, walk forward, walk tall, walk straight, let nothing stop you.
strength.author: Danny Scheinmann

strength.text: Recovery itself is a very un-glamorous daily process of being willing to fall down again, to break again, to cry again, to get up and try yet again until ‘success’ manifests as ever-greater sustained healing.
strength.author: Shannon Cutts

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: Don’t be afraid when you have to pray fervently because of your circumstances. God is wanting to do something great through you!
strength.author: Stormie Omartian

strength.text: Fac quod faciendum est,' ' Jo read aloud. 'Do what must be done.
strength.author: Jennifer Donnelly

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: What are you willing to lay down so you can stand up?
strength.author: Bobby F. Kimbrough Jr.

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: Rise in great might to fulfill your special specific mission.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Don't even listen to No body including your friends who tells you to Move On in life.  They often will have destroyed your Motivation causing an unexpected anxiety, and a severe brain stress until you give up. No matter how dead serious they are in order for you to understand them, reject their Anti-statement with the Power of your Assertion. They will foolishly halter your situation you had been encountering over the past year, when it all started from the beginning.Therefore, you MUST KEEP MOVING FORWARD.DO WHAT YOU NEED TO DO THAT NEEDS TO BE DONE.Train yourself to get strong so you can outsmart and surpass the famous people who came before you.That is the way of succeeding in life in order to prove to everyone you've overcome the Obstacles and your Anxiety.Keep moving forward always surpasses moving on.
strength.author: Luis Cosajay

strength.text: The glorious presence of God is with us. Let us rise in mighty strength to build the nation.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
strength.author: Albert Camus

strength.text: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.” Corrie ten Boom.
strength.author: Corrie ten Boom

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: Instead of being frustrated by adversity, our mind focuses on the adventure of creativity with our thoughts. What a glorious paradise?
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: For the weakest has but to try his strength to find it, and then he shall be strong.
strength.author: Robin Hobb

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: Music is the strength of the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: The greatest strength are rooted in love, joy, peace, patient, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self control.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: No struggle, no success! The strongest thunder strikes often bring the heaviest rainfall! The weight of your fulfillment depends on how wide you cast your nets!
strength.author: Israelmore Ayivor

strength.text: One of the best confidence builder is experience.
strength.author: Jaymin Shah

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: Thank God for the grace to work.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Always remember, animals can intimidate men with their strength but men cannot intimidate animals with their intelligence.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: Sometimes you just have to die a little inside in order to be reborn and rise again as a stronger and wiser version of you..!!
strength.author: Aagam Shah
